attributes.action: curtail the influence and activities of pro eating disorder sites on the internet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
pro-mia(bulimia)and pro-ana(anorexia)internet sites seek to promote these illnesses as "lifestyle choices".they target young and vunerable people to suggest that the illness is a normal state of being and they should resist seeking help.
thousands of individuals,familiy lives have been harmed by these illnesses.
we call upon the government and it's relevant departments to co-ordinate towards reducing or stopping the effect and influence of these harmful and misguided sites.
the misery of bulimia and anorexia can destroy individuals families and relationships,these sites help to make unbearable situations worse and need to be shown for what they are.
